0:
--------------------
Text: "Gleanntáin Ghlas' Ghaoth Dobhair" is a song in the Irish language written by Irish musician Proinsias Ó Maonaigh (father of Mairéad Ní Mhaonaigh of Altan) about his hometown of Gaoth Dobhair in County Donegal.
Triplets:<Proinsias Ó Maonaigh
1:
--------------------
Text: Gleanntáin Ghlas' Ghaoth Dobhair:  It translates as ""the green glens of Gweedore"".
Triplets:<Gleanntáin Ghlas' Ghaoth Dobhair
2:
--------------------
<Text: Gleanntáin Ghlas' Ghaoth Dobhair:  The song is one of the well-known Irish language songs of Ireland and it can be heard in many Irish pubs around the world.>
Triplets:<Gleanntáin Ghlas' Ghaoth Dobhair
